name: TamaGotcha
description:
You sneak out late at night to go play in the snow-blanketed fields of a neighboring farmstead. A streak of light fills the sky, impacting the ground some distance ahead. In the center of the crater there is a glowing shape.

After a time the light fades, revealing a strange, grub-like creature. You take it home, of course! But better not let mom find out...

A virtual pet / narrative adventure game about being a kid raising a mysterious alien creature, without drawing too much attention from your parents, the cops, or those shady guys in the Flowers By Irene van which has been parked down the street for the last couple of days...

Created for Ludum Dare 46, by:

• Andrew Trahan: https://twitter.com/andrewrtrahan
• Briarwick: https://twitter.com/BriarwickArt
• Fen Evetts: https://twitter.com/Fen_Evetts
• Jason Davey: https://twitter.com/StrayBasilisk
• Paul Sim: https://twitter.com/PaulSim_
• PixelBradii: https://twitter.com/PixelBradii
• Ryan "Syndicat" Holmes: https://soundcloud.com/syndicatdnb

If you enjoy this, you might also want to check out our main project, Steamhounds!
